scripts.test: echo && echo "* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * " && echo "About to run tests..." && echo && if ! node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --timeout 10000 ; then echo && echo && echo "- - -" && echo "Looks like something went wrong." && echo "|  If you are not sure what to do next, try:" && echo "|  npm install mocha --save-dev" && echo "|  " && echo "|  And then:" && echo "|  mkdir test/" && echo ; fi
